titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on 786 neutral vinyl acetate polymer in acqueous solution.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 11/18/2003--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 2008, the duty on 786 neutral vinyl acetate polymer in aqueous solution.
